typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Cust_ID as integer,
		Customer_Name as string,
		Dept_ID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Customers
source(output(
		Dept_ID as integer,
		Dept_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Department
Customers, Department join(Customers@Dept_ID == Department@Dept_ID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 split(Department@Dept_ID == 100,
	Department@Dept_ID == 500,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitAssignment3@(HR, Finance, Default)
ConditionalSplitAssignment3@HR sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Cust_ID as integer,
		Customer_Name as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink2
ConditionalSplitAssignment3@Finance sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Cust_ID as integer,
		Customer_Name as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink3
